member.name: T:SeoPlugin.SeoMiddleware
member.summary: Seo middleware class used to process Seo requests within the request pipeline.

member.name: M:SeoPlugin.SeoMiddlewareExtender.UseSeo(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary:
IApplicationBuilder extender method.
Allows easy use of registering SeoPlugin

member.name: T:SeoPlugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.SeoTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing Seo requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:SeoPlugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.SeoTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by SeoPlugin requests.

member.name: T:SeoPlugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the SeoPlugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
